protein.specific_function: Exhibits intrisinic GTPase activity. Shows a higher affinity for GDP over GTP (about 12-fold higher), and binding shows an absolute requirement for magnesium

reference.reference_text: Cambot M, Aresta S, Kahn-Perles B, de Gunzburg J, Romeo PH: Human immune associated nucleotide 1: a member of a new guanosine triphosphatase family expressed in resting T and B cells. Blood. 2002 May 1;99(9):3293-301.
